channel.title: How make master for players?
channel.description:
Tell me how do I make "master" commands for players? Source: Torvapkz _________________________________________________ Also I have another question... _________________________________________________
How i make spawning for players? And how do I make some items unspawnable? Please help! Source: TorvaPkz

item.title: How make master for players?
item.dc:creator: @Master_Jrh1 Master Jrh1
item.description:
@Master_Jrh1 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights == 3) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}
Change the right’s to the people you want to ue it…

Read full topic

item.title: How make master for players?
item.dc:creator: @Zosedan Zosedan
item.description:
@Zosedan wrote:

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for(int i=0; i<25; i++) { addSkillXP(Integer.MAX_VALUE, i); } }

Read full topic
